about_the_game:
Soundgrass is the product of a musician and filmmaker who decided to venture into the game industry, believing in the immense potential of games as a medium. The idea revolves around creating a universe where music possesses physical parameters different from our reality, almost as if one could touch the sound. In this way, the player experiences, through a mysterious and captivating story, sound and music like never seen before. Soundgrass aims to harness the power of entertainment to not only remain a traditional game but also to teach music and expand the understanding of music and sound.

-Explore a vast land covered in tall grass
-Solve puzzles based entirely on sound and music
-Experience a mysterious and emotional story as you explore the national park
-Learn music in the process!
